page.title: 01THE DEARNE AREA.
page.content: Our area is a small mining community. It is a reasonably close and friendly area consisting of working class people, most of the men are employed by the{National Coal Board.} The majority of women in our community work in factories and shops but some have a small part time job, or are housewives. Most of the land around us is farmland and slag heaps. Our community is slowly changing because of the rise in unemployment due to the closing down of{collieries}in our community, and lack of further investment in new industries. In five or more years our community could be an area without much work at all which will make it hard for the people who have just left school and are looking for jobs, because it will be nearly impossible to find work.
